scripts.say: ... Was that all...? It seems the only thing special about that bomb was its name.
You've nearly been bombed to pieces, yet you won't surrender?! You're going to sink if you let this continue!
So you want me to surrender, huh...
... Sorry, that's not happening. As a battleship, it's my wish to continue fighting till the very end.
Just how obstinate can you Iron Blood ships be?! Your sister said the same thing!
Bismarck...?! You've... met my sister...?
I have! We had almost the entire Royal Navy fighting your sister, me included. All I did was monitor her from a long distance with my planes, though...
Still, it's true, Bismarck said those very same words!
... I see... Thank you.
Huh? Thanks for what...?
She upheld her own beliefs, even till the very end, and sunk with the greatest service record ever seen.
Even in our world, her name will long remain in the memory of many people...
To us Iron Blood battleships, there's nothing more tragic than leaving your fate in the hands of others and being forgotten, having achieved nothing...
And I have you to thank for coming here and giving me one more chance to fire my cannons...
If I must trade my existence for one last honorable battle... then that's fine.
What are you saying?! This is no honourable way to go!
What are you, the Drama Queen in the North?! Or do you just want to look cool?! I'm offering you the chance to live, and you refuse...?!
You're making ME out to be the villain here...
... Fine. I give up. Task Force One, we're pulling out. Turn 180 degrees and advance at half speed.
... You're leaving? This is your chance to earn glory, your chance to make glorious history...
Of course honour and glory are appealing... But I can't stand to earn them this way...
W-what I mean is... my planes are out of fuel, that's all! ...My word, how lucky for you! Hmph!
Message to flagship Duke of York...
"The 'Queen in the North' has been seriously damaged, but could not be sunk. Operation Tungsten has ended in failure..."
... What an unpredictable lady...
... I doubt we will ever meet again...
I wonder how far your compassion will get you... I hope to one day find out...
